features: 𝗙𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘃𝗲 𝗪𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗸𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 -1300W powerful steamer for clothes heats up in just 15 seconds and helps get wrinkles out of clothes and fabrics quickly for a fresh, crease-free look.

𝟯𝟬𝟬𝗺𝗹 𝗕𝗶𝗴 𝗪𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗧𝗮𝗻𝗸 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 -Travel steamer with 300ml water tank, extending the working time up to 18 minutes, reducing the annoyance of adding water frequently. Detachable design easy to fill. The translucent water tank allow you to observe the water level at all times.

𝗡𝗼 𝗟𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗖𝗹𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘀 -Ordinary clothes steamer tend to spurt or leak water, which can stain and even ruin your garments! Our handheld steamer use unique leak-proof design, no leaking, no spilling, allows steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally.

𝗔𝗹𝗹-𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗙𝗮𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗰 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀 -Steamer for clothes safe to use on all fabrics - cotton, wool, polyester, plush, silk, fiber, nylon, velvet and linen, suitable for clothes, bedding, table clothes, sofas, toys and so much more.

𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗨𝘀𝗲 𝗚𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 -Two detachable brushes help work steam deeper into the fibers to smooth wrinkles. Clothes steamer glove helps do the steam job much easier and more effective, especially the pointy head better to iron the sleeves and collar of the shirt/suit.

𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀 -Lightweight, portable size and ergonomic hand held design ensure comfortable control, this steamer is easy to use, store and perfect for home, office and travel. Get this steamer for clothes to make life and work easier.
body.description: ⛳Portable steamer for clothes is the prefect choice for business travel, home, white-collar workers. 💯Easy to pack into any luggage, you no longer have to worry about the wrinkles of clothes when traveling. 💎Steamer for clothes with the 14-hole nozzle and wide steam exit, the 20G/MIN steam is discharged strongly and evenly, penetrate the steam more thoroughly into the fabric, steamer for clothes effectively remove the toughest wrinkles. ✨Garment steamer great for clothes, bedding, curtains and more. Clothes steamer relaxes wrinkles and refreshes fabrics without chemicals and saves you money on dry cleaning. 🏅Handheld travel steamer has continuous steam function. Use the lock button for continuous steam with no need to keep the trigger pushed down. 𝐓𝐡𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫 🟢Low Steam Mode: Produces a lower amount of steam, steamer suitable for delicate fabrics or garments that require gentle ironing. 🟠Medium Steam Mode: Generates a moderate amount of steam, steamer suitable for most fabrics and everyday clothing items. 🔴High Steam Mode: Releases a higher amount of steam, steamer ideal for stubborn wrinkles and heavy fabrics that require more powerful ironing. 𝐇𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬 🧪Please read operation instruction before use. 🧪 Recommend fill the distilled water to avoid scale or water pipe blocking. 🧪Never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself. 🧪For better results, use a hanger for your clothes while steaming. 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐁𝐨𝐱 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐬 📘1xSteamer for Clothes 📘1xSteamer Glove 📘1xSteamer Soft Brush 📘1xSteamer Fabric Brush 📘1xSteamer Cup 📘1xStorage Bag 📘1xUser Manual

productInformation.name: Style
productInformation.value: Floor-standing Garment Steamer & Handheld Steamer for Clothes

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Clothes steamers are not limited to clothing care; they offer versatile applications beyond garment steaming. With the right attachments and settings, a clothes steamer can also freshen up curtains, upholstery, and bedding, and even remove wrinkles from delicate items such as wedding dresses or suits.

productInformation.name: Finish types
productInformation.value: Steamer use steam to remove wrinkles from clothes

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Using distilled water can prevent the buildup of minerals. After ironing, please let the steamer cool down naturally, don't use water to cool down. After each use, please pour out the water, then wipe the steamer with soft cloth, When not in use, please unplug the power and turn off the button. Please store the clothes steamer in dry environment.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: Please Check This Package Upon Receiving It. If Steamer Was No Seal, Damaged Or Used, Please Do Not Return This Steamer To Amazon. Please Contact Us(Seller) First Instead Of Amazon.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: 1x Steamer Soft Brush, 1x Steamer User Manual, 1x Steamer Fabric Brush, 1x Steamer Storge Bag, 1x Steamer Cup, 1x Handheld Steamer for Clothes, 1x Steamer Ironing Glove

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is great, it was easy to use and not too big. I took it with me on a trip and it worked great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works as described!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Works as described. I am happy with this garment steamer. However, I have a suggestion. The water reservoir is designed so that you can't empty it completely. This needs to be corrected so that mold or mildew won't develop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice handheld steamer that does it's job quite well. Doesn't clog up at all and steams everything perfectly.I like the size, it helps to keep the steam concentrated on where I need it.I didn't know I needed this until I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is easy to setup, use, and works really well on all types of fabric. I use for shirts and pants/shorts. It quickly removes wrinkles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It really works
reviews.reviewText: I really like it it work for what I use it for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to travel with
reviews.reviewText: I love that this is light enough to travel with. But my favorite part is the handy bag that I can store it in when I travel. Makes it reasonable for a suitcase but even more a perfect partner for my gym bag. My gym is great but I don’t have access to get the wrinkles out of my dress clothes in the morning. This works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: High temperature steam disinfection, mobile steam hanging ironing machine, convenient storage, simple shape, easy to design
